baboonbob wrote "chances are she doesn't have the money or manpower to keep offering tapes."  

You are mistaken; the 12-tape albums sold for $100 each and were EXTREMELY PROFITABLE from a business standpoint.   If money was the problem, Melissa would, if anything, market these even more.   This is BIG MONEY that she is throwing away.   

Such action would be inexplicable except for the fact that she is not doing it of her own free will -- she is under external control by VERY POWERFUL FORCES.

I've been listening to her for the past few months, trying to give her the benefit of the doubt. But I've come to the conclusion that you are absolutely right. I can find no other explanation. The same forces that attacked Dr. Scott are now attacking her, and she is no match. God help her.

That is of course, unless she is willingly so, and has been from the start, which is a distinct possibility. They'd been working on him for decades, and they knew what would NOT work. But they also knew what WOULD work- send someone to work their ass off for him and win his trust and confidence. What did he always say about her? That she served him devotedly, like no one else ever had. Too good to be true?

I think the second possibility you mention is the correct one.

If the targeted individual is unmarried and of special importance, they may go so far as to send in a dedicated AGENT, specially trained for the job, to gain the affections and trust of the target, with the goal of marriage and the resulting high degree of surveillance and influence such a relationship makes possible.
